sections.heading: Sheriff; deputies; compensation
sections.text: The county board shall furnish the sheriff with such deputies as it shall deem necessary and fix the compensation of such deputies who shall be paid by warrant drawn on the general fund.SourceLaws 1907, c. 54, ยง 2, p. 228;Laws 1911, c. 50, ยง 1, p. 233;R.S.1913, ยง 2443
